rebuilding_satellites.name: rebuilding_satellites
rebuilding_satellites.title: Rebuilding Satellites
rebuilding_satellites.start_text:
Right. So.
The mites, those mineral-eating, satellite-snacking nightmares, they’ve completely destroyed our comm network and ate our mining ship.
Now HQ can’t reach us.
They might already be trying to contact us and getting nothing.
I really, really need this fixed before they decide I’m the reason everything’s gone to hell.
Please, please help me out here. Bring me the materials to rebuild the satellites.
I’ve heard Phantom is taking materials in trade. You need to get them four hundred units of metal and one hundred microchips. Metal is in the asteroid field southeast of here. You’ll need a mining laser to dig it up and a mini smelter to process it.
Microchips you can buy from Bastion out west, or make yourself if you know how.
If this works, maybe we’ll get comms back.
If not... Well, I don’t even want to think about that.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Newbie Administrator at Phantom.
outcomes.end_text:
Done.
If HQ asks what we’ve been doing out here, I can honestly say,
We handled everything.
Small victory, but I’ll take it.

mining_ship_replacement.name: mining_ship_replacement
mining_ship_replacement.title: Mining Ship Replacement
mining_ship_replacement.start_text: Alright, listen up. No ship means no mining. No mining means we starve. We need a replacement. Fast. I need you to bring me: One harvester, in item form. Also bring a Rock Drill and a Mining Organ. Both are available at Phaistos in Alcor, that’s to the north of here. The Rock Drill isn’t cheap, but it can double as a weapon. Which means hopefully fewer disasters next time. Get these parts and get them here. We’re running out of time.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Newbie Administrator at Phantom.
outcomes.end_text:
Okay. That’s... something.
For the first time since this whole mess started, it feels like the ground isn’t sliding out from under me.
Just for a second.
The fear’s still there. So is the silence. But at least now, there’s the tiniest shape of a plan.
And I’m holding on to that. Hard.

adding_guards.name: adding_guards
adding_guards.title: Adding Guards
adding_guards.start_text: Look, we can't just react to every crisis. That’s how we get picked off one system at a time. We need ships. Guns. Defenses. Something that makes the mites think twice before crawling back in. I’ve scraped together a plan. A few fast attack ships. Some proper gear. Nothing fancy, just enough to stop the next disaster from eating us alive. Here's what I need: Three Stingers - agile little warships, cheap to run and hard to catch. Six Pocket Railguns - reliable, effective, and they punch through armor like it's paper. Six Chitin Armors - they regenerate over time, so we won’t be spending every hour fixing holes. Three Barrier Alphas - they recharge fast, and that means fewer panicked repair jobs in the middle of combat. I know it’s a lot. But if we pull this together, maybe - we’ll actually be ready next time.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Newbie Administrator at Phantom
outcomes.end_text: Okay. They're here. The ships, the gear, all of it. Lined up and armed. And the feeling that maybe we’re not completely helpless anymore, I didn’t realize how much I needed that.
